item.description:
Gardner After Hours: Spring Splendor

Thursday, May 20, 2010
5:30pm - 9:30pm

Join us After Hours every third Thursday for a new kind of night out. After Hours is music, art, conversation, cocktails and more in an
inviting atmosphere.

Isabella Gardner’s palace takes on an otherworldly beauty after dark, when starry skies and moonlight contribute to its magic. Linger in the cloisters or around the courtyard, explore or sketch in the galleries, discover new exhibitions, revel in live music, sample the culinary fare in the Café. Join your friends at the Gardner third Thursdays for a new kind of night out. Cash bar but the atmosphere is on us.

Also, join us for an After Hours PLUS performance at 7pm:
Jazz at the Gardner concert featuring the Mark Whitfield Jr. Quartet

Tickets: $12 General Public; $10 Seniors; $5 Students; FREE Members
After Hours PLUS: $23 General Public; $18 Seniors; $15 Members; $10 Students

Date: Thursday, May 20, 2010
Time: 5:30 PM - 9:30 PM


http://connect.gardne...

Maia 781-718-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Splendor
